2071930.name: Queen's Wish 2 Hintbook and Bonuses
2071930.description:
Stuck on a puzzle? Not sure how to conquer (or escape) the Rokaj? Can't decide who to punish and which bribes to take? Want to explore all of the wild mountains? Get the Queen's Wish 2: The Tormentor Hintbook and Extras!

The Queen's Wish 2 Hintbook contains a full walkthrough for the main storyline and all side quests! It's full of maps, tips, tricks, and other help to get you unstuck. The Hintbook also contains a full list of cheat codes to heal your characters, boost their power, and cheat in a variety of amusing ways.

This deluxe kit also contains the full documentation and exclusive desktop art and wallpapers.

Directions to use the DLC:

1. Right click (Control-click on Mac) "Queen's Wish 2: The Tormentor" in the games list in your Steam library.
2. Select "Properties."
3. In the "Local Files" tab, select "Browse Local Files."
4. All your goodies are in the "Deluxe Edition" folder. You can drag them to your desktop for easy access.

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
